    bartMachine - package bartMachine

    hyper_k - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams

    hyper_lambda - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
    the multiplier of the scale parameter of the inverse gamma prior on the variance
    hyper_mu_mu - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
    the center of the prior of the terminal node prediction distribution
    hyper_nu - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
    half the shape parameter and half the multiplicand of the scale parameter of the inverse gamma prior on the variance
    hyper_nu - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
    half the shape parameter and half the multiplicand of the scale parameter of the inverse gamma prior on the variance
    hyper_q - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
    At a fixed hyper_nu, this controls where to set hyper_lambda by forcing q proportion to be at that value in the inverse gamma CDF
    hyper_q - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachineRegressionMultThread
    At a fixed hyper_nu, this controls where to set hyper_lambda by forcing q proportion to be at that value in the inverse gamma CDF
    hyper_sigsq_mu - Variable in class bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
